title: CajaSur
text:
CajaSur is a Spanish <a href="Savings%20bank%20%28Spain%29">savings bank</a>, property of <a href="Kutxabank">Kutxabank</a>. It has offices in <a href="Andalusia">Andalusia</a> and <a href="Extremadura">Extremadura</a>.
Until 2011, CajaSur was a Spanish <a href="Savings%20bank%20%28Spain%29">savings bank</a>, run by the priests in the Catholic Church, located in <a href="C%C3%B3rdoba%2C%20Spain">Córdoba, Spain</a>. It was seized in May 2010 and defaulted in December 2010.
